2_17pnj2wEu5qFeRtQErmLVtCBvYuocGum82.body:
Incompleto ¿errores?. Publica tu versión corregida, please. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- "Congratulation, your port {0} is opened.
You are full member of ZeroNet network!": "Felicidades tu puerto {0} está abierto.
¡Tú eres un miembro completo de Zeronet network!", "Tor mode active, every connection using Onion route.": "Tor está en modo activo, cada conexíon usa una ruta Onion ", "Successfully started Tor onion hidden services.": "Tor empezará sucesivamente a ocultar los servicios onion.", "Unable to start hidden services, please check your config.": " En caso de que no oculte tus servicios, por favor chequea tu configuración .", "For faster connections open {0} port on your router.": "Para conexiones rápidas abre {0} un puerto en tu ruter.", "Your connection is restricted. Please, open {0} port on your router": "Tu conexión está restringida. Por favor, abre {0} un puerto en tu ruter", "or configure Tor to become full member of ZeroNet network.": "o configura Tor para recibir completamente a los miembros de Zeronet network.", "Select account you want to use in this site:": "Selecciona la cuenta que tú quieres utilizar en este sitio:", "currently selected": "actualmente seleccionada", "Unique to site": "Única para el sitio", "Content signing failed": "Firma de contenido fallida", "Content publish queued for {0:.0f} seconds.": "Publicación de contenido dentro de {0:.0f} segundos.", "Content published to {0} peers.": "Contenido publicado para {0} pares.", "No peers found, but your content is ready to access.": "Ningún par encontrado, pero tu contenido es accesible para leer.", "Your network connection is restricted. Please, open {0} port": "Tu configuraciíon network está limitada. Por favor, abre un puerto{0}", "on your router to make your site accessible for everyone.": "en tu ruter para hacer el sitio más accesible para todo el mundo.", "Content publish failed.": "Publicación de contenido fallido.", "This file still in sync, if you write it now, then the previous content may be lost.": "Este archivo está aún sincronizado, sí tú escribes ahora, el contenido previo puede ser perdido.", "Write content anyway": "Escribe el contenido de nuevo", "New certificate added:": "Nuevo certificado añadido:", "You current certificate:": "Tu certificado actual:", "Change it to {auth_type}/{auth_user_name}@{domain}": "Ändere es zu {auth_type}/{auth_user_name}@{domain}", "Certificate changed to: {auth_type}/{auth_user_name}@{domain}.": "Zertifikat geändert zu: {auth_type}/{auth_user_name}@{domain}.", "Site cloned": "Seite geklont", "You have successfully changed the web interface's language!": "¡Tú acabas de cambiar el idioma de la interfaz web!", "Due to the browser's caching, the full transformation could take some minute.": "El cambio puede tardar unos minutos en aparecer completamente en tu navegador.", "Connection with UiServer Websocket was lost. Reconnecting...": "Conexión con UiServer Websocket se ha perdido. Reconectando...", "Connection with UiServer Websocket recovered.": "Conexión con UiServer Websocket recuperada.", "UiServer Websocket error, please reload the page.": "UiServer Websocket error, por favor recargue la página.", "   Connecting...": "   Verbinden...", "Site size: ": "Tamaño del sitio: ", "MB is larger than default allowed ": "MB es mayor de lo permitido por defecto", "Open site and set size limit to \" + site_info.next_size_limit + \"MB": "Öffne Seite und setze das limit auf \" + site_info.next_size_limit + \"MB", " files needs to be downloaded": " Los archivos necesitan ser descargados", " downloaded": " descargados", " download failed": " descarga fallida", "Peers found: ": "Pares encontrados: ", "No peers found": "Ningún par encontrado", "Running out of size limit (": "Funcionando por debajo del tamaño límite (", "Set limit to \" + site_info.next_size_limit + \"MB": "Limit auf \" + site_info.next_size_limit + \"MB ändern", "Site size limit changed to {0}MB": "Speicher Limit für diese Seite auf {0}MB geändert", " New version of this page has just released.
Reload to see the modified content.": " Una nueva versión de esta página está disponible .
Reinicia la web para ver el contenido modificado .", "This site requests permission:": "Este sitio solicita permisos:", "Grant": "Genehmigen" }

{ "Congratulation, your port {0} is opened.
You are full member of ZeroNet network!": "¡Felicidades! tu puerto {0} está abierto.

Please, open {0} port": "Tu conexión de red está restringida. Reconnecting...": "Se perdió la conexión con UiServer Websocket. { "ZeroNet: Decentralized websites using Bitcoin crypto and the BitTorrent network": "ZeroNet: Decentralisierte Webseiten mithilfe von Bitcoin kryptographie und dem BitTorrent Netzwerk", "Open, free and uncensorable websites,
using Bitcoin cryptography and BitTorrent network": "Offene, freie und unzensierbare Webseiten,
mithilfe von Bitcoin kryptographie und BitTorrent Netzwerk", "Download for Windows": "Herunterladen für Windows", "Unpack · Run zeronet.cmd": "Extrahieren · zeronet.cmd ausführen", "or": "oder", "Other platforms and source code": "Andere Platformen und Quell-Code", "Download for macOS": "Herunterladen für macOS", "Unpack · Run ZeroNet": "Extrahieren · ZeroNet ausführen", "Unpack · Open Terminal application · Drop ZeroNet on it and press enter.": "Extrahieren · Terminal Programm öffnen · ZeroNet hinein ziehen und Enter drücken.", "Download for Linux 64bit": "Herunterladen für Linux (64bit)", "Install instructions": "Installations Anleitung", "Windows, Linux, Mac supported": "Windows, Linux, Mac unterstüzt", "Peer-to-Peer": "Peer-zu-Peer", "Your content distributed directly to other visitors without any central server.": "Deine Inhalte werden direkt zu anderen Besuchern verteilt ohne einen zentralen Server.", "Uncensored": "Unzensiert", "It's nowhere because it's everywhere!": "Es ist niergendwo, weil es überall ist!", "No hosting costs": "Keine Hosting-Kosten", "Sites are served by visitors.": "Seiten werden von Besuchern verteilt.", "Always accessible": "Immer verfügbar", "No single point of failure.": "Kein Punkt des Versagens", "Simple": "Einfach", "No configuration needed:": "Keine konfiguration benötigt:", "Download, unpack and start using it.": "Downloaden, extrahieren und verwenden.", ".bit domains": ".bit Domains", "Decentralized domains using Namecoin cryptocurrency.": "Decentralisierte Domains mithilfe der Namecoin Krypto-Währung.", "No passwords": "Keine Passwörter", "Your account is protected by same cryptography as your Bitcoin wallet.": "Dein Konto ist geschützt durch die selbe kryptographie wie dein Bitcoin Portemonnaie.", "Fast": "Schnell", "Page response time is not limited by your connection speed.": "Seiten Antworzeit ist nicht begrentzt durch deien Verbindungs-Geschwindigkeit.", "Dynamic content": "Dynamische Inhalte", "Real-time updated, multi-user websites.": "In Echtzeit aktualisierte, mehr-benutzer Webseiten.", "How does it work?": "Wie funktioniert es?", "Works everywhere": "Funktioniert überall", "Supports any modern browser on
Windows, Linux or Mac platforms.": "Unterstützt alle modernen Browser auf
Windows, Linux oder Mac Platformen.", "Anonymity": "Anonymität", "You can easily hide your IP address using the Tor network.": "Du kannst deine IP einfach, durch Verwendung des Tor-Netzwerks, verstecken", "Read the FAQ": "Lese das FAQ", "Offline": "Offline", "Browse the sites you're seeding even if your internet connection is down.": "Browse die Seiten die du seedest auch wenn keine Internet-Verbindung besteht.", "Open Source": "Open Source", "Developed by the community for the community.": "Entwickelt von der Community für die Community.", "Please donate to keep this project alive": "Bitte Spende um dieses Projekt am laufen zu halten", "We believe in": "Wir glauben an", "open, free, and uncensored": "offene, freie und unzensierte", "network and communication.": "Netzwerke und Kommunikation"
